Texts.Chs:
足够多的人喝这个，所以它是装在纸盒子里的？
^red;-^white;5%^red;HP^gray;&^red;伤害^gray;，^cyan;+^white;5%^cyan;速度^gray;，^cyan;+^white;8%^cyan;跳跃^gray;，^cyan;加强空中力量^gray;(^white;持续1m^gray;)^reset;
Texts.Eng:
Enough people drink this that it comes in cartons?
^red;-^white;5% ^red;HP ^gray;& ^red;Damage^gray;, ^cyan;+^white;5% ^cyan;Run^gray;, ^cyan;+^white;8% ^cyan;Jump^gray;, ^cyan;Increased Air Force ^gray;(^white;1m^gray;)^reset;
